title: 1.149 STATE MUSHROOM.
text:
Morchella esculenta, commonly known as the morel, sponge mushroom, or honeycomb morel, is adopted as the official state mushroom of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph of the morel, approved by the commissioner of natural resources, shall be preserved and may be displayed in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: state_mushroom
variables.description: The official state mushroom of a state.

variables.name: photo_approved
variables.description: Indicates if the photograph of the morel is approved by the commissioner of natural resources.

consequences: Morchella esculenta is the official state mushroom of Minnesota.
A photograph of the morel is approved and may be displayed in the Office of the Secretary of State.
